name: Keen Nose
description: You have ADV on Checks to that rely on use your sense of smell.

name: Pack Hunter
description: A number of times equal to your Proficiency per day, you can give yourself or an ally ADV on an attack if you are adjacent to them.

name: Protect the Pack
description: Once per Long Rest, if an Attack is going to hit an adjacent creature, you can swap places with them making you the target of the attack instead.

name: Sharp Claws
description: When you make an Unarmed Attack your base damage is 1 and the damage type can be Bludgeoning or Slashing.

name: Prowler
description: You have ADV on Stealth Checks.

name: Land on Your Feet
description: You take 1 less damage from Falling and have ADV on against effects and Saves that would make you fall Prone.

name: Flexible Skeleton
description: You suffer no Speed penalty for squeezing into a space that is only large enough for a creature that is one size smaller than you.

name: Prey Instinct
description: You have ADV on checks and saves against being Grappled and on Saves to avoid traps.

name: Keen Nose
description: You have ADV on Checks to that rely on use your sense of smell.
